00056 GtkListStore *completion_model;
00057 
00059 pnp_file_t *
00060 pnp_fopen(char *filename)
00061 {
00062 
00063     pnp_file_t *fd;
00064     struct stat statinfo;
00065     int filenr;
00066     
00067     fd = (pnp_file_t *)malloc(sizeof(pnp_file_t));
00068     memset(fd,0,sizeof(pnp_file_t));
00069     if (fd == NULL) {
00070        return NULL;
00071     }
00072     fd->fd = fopen(filename, "r");
00073     if (fd->fd == NULL) {
00074         GERB_MESSAGE("FD was NULL");
00075        return NULL;
00076     }
00077 
00078     filenr = fileno(fd->fd);
00079     fstat(filenr, &statinfo);
00080     if (!S_ISREG(statinfo.st_mode)) {
00081        errno = EISDIR;
00082        return NULL;
00083     }
00084     if ((int)statinfo.st_size == 0) {
00085        errno = EIO; /* More compatible with the world outside Linux */
00086        return NULL;
00087     }
00088 
00089     fd->model = interface.model;
00090 
00091     return fd;
00092 } /* pnp_fopen */
00093 
00094 
00096 void
00097 pnp_fclose(pnp_file_t *fd)
00098 {
00099     if(fd == NULL)
00100         return;
00101     fclose(fd->fd);
00102     free(fd);
00103     
00104     return;
00105 } /* pnp_fclose */
00106 
00107 #endif /* USE_GTK2 */
